Instructions: SAMPLE COLLECTION - Port Orange FL - 14:00 EST - Solo Mission
1. Move to any rock of interest at the site
2. Take ARRCHER out of the right suit pocket to begin the sampling process
3.Follow the instructional images of how to properly open ARRCHER. Once finished continue to the next instructions
4.Pick up the sample as shown in the image
5. Say *Hey Lumin take a photo* while the sample is in view
6. Inspect the sample either through the ARRCHER or by hand
7a. Describe the general size/ Length x width x height/ color tone/ texture
7b. Describe its micro-scale geogly such as: funamdental components/ mineral discriptions: size/ shape/ color/ sorting/ durabitlity/ density/ surface features
